page.title: 06FARMS 2 AND RARER PLANTS
page.content: (cont.from page 5) gardens & Andrew Speight & M.Elsworth keep pigs. { {LUMBY} Well Farm (Mills),Hall Farm (H.R. Batty & sons).Hollings farm (J. Kirkman ) and Steeton Hall Farm,which are all arable with E.Makin and Son at Laurels Farm keeping{breeding ewes}as well as being{arable.} { { {RARER PLANTS.(Monk Fryston)} The building at{Rarer Plants}was built around{1850,}but has only been a plant centre for 20 months. Mrs Watson, the onwer has one acre of land and is open from 1.30 p.m to 5.30 p.m. on most days.She enjoys her work, growing{rare herbs}and cottage {garden plants.}
